verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:4
verses.text: I will call on the Lord, who is worthy to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:5
verses.text: When the waves of death compassed me, the floods of ungodly men made me afraid;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:6
verses.text: The sorrows of hell compassed me about; the snares of death prevented me;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:7
verses.text: In my distress I called upon the Lord, and cried to my God: and he did hear my voice out of his temple, and my cry did enter into his ears.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:8
verses.text: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations of heaven moved and shook, because he was wroth.
